nodes.title: Why was There a Stranded Sperm Whale in Wakatobi, Indonesia?

But what we do know: a staggering 5.9 kg of plastic items found in its stomach. We talk to WWF-Indonesia’s Dewi Satriani to tell us more about this appalling incident.
